comments:
Build M5

As of the M5 build, my projects have grown myriads of extra CVS directories 
(e.g. com.CVS, com.ibm.CVS).  James explained why this was happening, and 
suggested that to fix it I should delete the project and load it again from 
the repository.

This worked fine for the first project, but the second project I tried 
encountered a few errors (as follows).

After the errors occurred, I tried deleting the project again (and confirmed 
that the directory was really removed) and then I found the project in the 
repository and chose 'Check out as Project'.  The same errors occurred again.
